release.change: The cat and mouse game continues
Update to API 30 since google is forcing that as a minimum for updates in the play store
Should work on rooted and unrooted devices
Updated permissions screen for instructions to grant access to private api
Gauges now use the system accent color
Make adb commands from the permissions screen selectable
Removed separators from adb command so that they can be copy pasted
Fixed on-boarding in regards to PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS / APPOPS_USAGE_STATS
Theme now defaults to system theme
Removed appops that is not supported anymore
